content:
CP-572 Smoke and acoustic spray High-elasticity firestop spray for construction joints in non-fire-rated assemblies ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy spray application Broad application temperature range allows use in warm and cold environments (40-104°F) Excellent sound and air barrier characteristics limits sound transmission and restricts smoke migration Applications Sealing construction joint openings in non fire-rated acoustical barriers and smoke partitions ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chemical basis: Water-based acrylic dispersion Color: White Shelf life: 12 Months Technical Data | Chemical basis | Water-based acrylic dispersion | Color | White | Shelf life | 12 Months | 1 | Acoustics performance | Test report available | Movement | ±12.5% (ISO 11600) | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 10
Smoke development: 5 | Product Class | Ultimate | Tested in accordance with | UL 2079 (L-rating only), ASTM E84, ASTM G21, ASTM E90 | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 35 - 95 °F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 176 °F | Can be painted | Yes | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Masonry, Metal | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 412592 - Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - Package Size 1 pc - 3542315 - CP 572 Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 3517791 - CP572 Spray combo 18x pails & Graco 595 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 595 - 3518084 - CP572 Spray combo 18x pails & Graco 695 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 695 - 3518085 - CP572 Spray combo 36x pails & Graco 695 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 695 - 3518083 - CP572 Spray combo 54x pails & Graco 595 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 54x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 595 - 3518086 - CP572 Spray combo 54x pails & Graco 695 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 54x Sealant CP 572 SA spray 5 gal - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 695
